backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the addition of 'Criminal defense' to the consultation form service selector.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of multiple frontend files describing layout, sections, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO metadata, font preconnects, and root mount for the SPA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app registering routes and wrapping routed content with AppLayout and an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: Accordion dropdown listing service options, including newly added 'Criminal defense,' with selection handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Class-based React error boundary rendering a styled fallback UI and reload button on errors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with contact info, social links, and hash‑based smooth scrolling or navigation.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: About and approach section describing the firm and a multi‑item approach grid with styled content.
Interactive FAQ section with toggleable questions and embedded JSON-LD schema for SEO.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: Contact-focused call-to-action section featuring buttons that navigate or scroll to the contact area.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with legal services messaging and buttons that navigate to or scroll to the contact page.
Responsive navigation bar that handles scrolling to homepage sections and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: Step-by-step vertical layout describing the legal support process.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Grid display of partner organizations with names and categories.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Renders a services grid with icons and navigation handlers for viewing more services or contacting the firm.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Displays a grid of testimonial cards with quotes, names, and roles.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Shows trust indicators with icons and animated stats highlighting experience and results.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides layout with navbar and handles hash-based scrolling on navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login handling, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a simple wrapper exposing the actor and loading state for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, typography, components, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with firm values, team profiles, distinctive features, and navigation actions to contact or services.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a consultation form with validation, submission handling, and service selection UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the home page by assembling multiple marketing and informational sections plus a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 error card with messaging and a button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports structured data describing available legal services with names, icons, and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of legal services from servicesData and includes a CTA that navigates to the contact page.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Defines a minimal client-side router with path registration, navigation, subscription, and path resolution utilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including existing and new feature requests for adding a 'Criminal defense' service option to the Contact Us form. Contains metadata such as schema version, project details, and issue tracking.
